tool_description: Extract text from various formats like images or PDF files
name: OCR Text extraction
title: OCR Text extraction

api_list.name: job result
api_list.description:
Posting to the OCR endpoint creates a job for the analysis. With this endpoint, you can check the status of the job and get the result.
Possible status are: 
* PENDING
* STARTED
* RETRY
* FAILURE
* SUCCESS
